item.description: Oh geez Iâ€™m playing Wordless again. Wordle 335 4/6 â¬œðŸŸ¨â¬œâ¬œâ¬œ â¬œâ¬œâ¬œâ¬œâ¬œ ðŸŸ¨ðŸŸ©â¬œðŸŸ©ðŸŸ© ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©
Long COVID is crashing the retirement hopes of many Americans. https://t.co/3PpQ5RjNwU
SpaceX Paid $250,000 to a Flight Attendant Who Accused Elon Musk of Sexual Misconduct. https://t.co/gbombkRMBG
@wgrosso Good point.
Professor Zeynep Tufekci to Assume Role as Inaugural Director of the "Craig Newmark" Center for Journalism Ethics and Security. https://t.co/U497pmuO9h
I don't get where people who are selling their stock are putting the proceeds. Anything that's "safe" will be subject to inflation.

World domination is definitely at stake, now, in the fight between the Repubs and everyone else. https://t.co/eP1M1Ew3y1
The news has to do more than report the upcoming elections as democracy-decisive, they should be connecting the elections to Russia, China, Ukraine, NATO, all of it.
The US is far from isolated, we are being controlled by outside powers, through both parties, probably, but most visibly through the Repubs.
If the election system were a network we would have had to shut it down to close all the back doors that the Repubs are now taking advantage of.
But you have to think of the Repubs as a global power, rich people trying to achieve world domination. How America is governed is a big part of the coup but it's not the whole thing.
Wordle 334 5/6 â¬œâ¬œâ¬œâ¬œðŸŸ© â¬œâ¬œâ¬œâ¬œâ¬œ â¬œðŸŸ¨â¬œâ¬œðŸŸ© â¬œðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ¨ðŸŸ© ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©
@anildash @fastly @glitch Congrats Anil! Glitch is a great ground-breaking product. I hope it continues to evolve in its new home.
Glitch acquired by cloud service provider Fastly. https://t.co/A5dpLv6FTm
Actually a troll gets you to RT what he writes. So I'm the idiot. I take back what I said about him being an idiot. I don't know or care what he is. Have a nice day. :-)

@jeffjarvis he's a fucking idiot. i take back everything i said about him being smart. some things aren't on spectrums. whether or not you steal my medicare and social security is not something you can be moderate on! fool. abortion doesn't have a "moderate" position.

BTW, I agree with @jayrosen_nyu that reporters have a fully acceptable conflict of interest in democracy. They have to be in favor of it. There aren't two sides. Why? Because they couldn't exist without it.

We should have a confluence of wise minds. Every month they get together and do a Doomsday Clock for the health of American democracy, with a short statement that they agree on that describes it. Kind of like a weather report for the grimness of our political future.
I'm not going to suggest a list, but they have to be people who never try not to offend, they strive to say exactly what they think. I'd suggest people whose careers are mostly behind them so they aren't trying to build names for themselves.
That said -- one person who absolutely should be part of this is @georgelakoff. He understands something that I don't think many Democrats understand, how important language is in politics. The Repubs understand and use language very effectively. A huge gap that's easily filled.
Clarence Thomas Has Gone Full Hack. https://t.co/BqRE11kdZA
